name: Space Cards
description:
Mix and Game Jam 2020 participant!
Bullet-hell + Card game

Space cards is a bullet hell set in space, duh!
Defeat waves of enemies while you upgrade your ship and weapons with cards.
After every wave you can select an upgrade card, choose wisely!

You can also pickup health or shield buffs, but can you make it through all the bullets to get them?

Controls: 
WASD - Move
MOUSE - Aim
LEFT MOUSE - Shoot
